sentences.en: For better or worse, they were also unhindered by the regulatory process.
sentences.cn: 不管好坏, 这些固定的程序妨碍不了他们.

sentences.en: Influence can only flow unhindered if board is empty, however.
sentences.cn: 可是,影响仅当棋盘为空时能不受妨碍地流过.

sentences.en: Road from storehouse to front of coke oven shall be even and unhindered.
sentences.cn: 仓库到炉前的道路要平坦、畅通.

sentences.en: She had unhindered access to the files.
This kind of unhindered feeling and appreciation for the work set us thinking.
sentences.cn: 这种对作品毫无障碍的感知和欣赏引起了我们的思考.

sentences.en: Transparent surfaces, unhindered visual axes and long views produce an atmosphere of spaciousness.
sentences.cn: 透明的表面, 不受阻隔的视线产生了空间上的纵深感.

sentences.en: What preparation needs to be done to allow Jesus unhindered access to your own heart?
sentences.cn: 究竟要预备什麽,好让主耶稣可以无阻碍地进入你的内心?

words.tran_cn: 不受妨碍的，不受阻碍的

trans.tran_cn: 不受妨碍的，不受阻碍的，顺畅
